entry.title: $1900 // Clean, bright 1BR/1BA apartment two blocks from Nostrand 3 station
entry.content:
Clean, quiet, bright and furnished one bedroom/one bathroom apartment for rent by owner.
Available for annual lease. Shorter term is possible.

Total area about 600 ft.² with a private 125 ft.² outdoor area. Apartment has three south facing windows. Very private and comfortable, close to supermarkets, restaurants and nightlife. Two blocks from subway. All utilities included (gas, electric, water, wifi). Well-behaved dogs will be considered subject to interview and pet fee.

To set a time to view, please reply with a sentence about yourself including your telephone number and the best time to call.
